title: My account
body: Ok so let me just get into it you guys can call me dumb and ignorant all u want but I fell for it I have another account called TrumpDeportedMe and a good friend sent me a link to a website called --snip--.com ok and I went to the website today to check it out again and its no longer open and I asked my friend about it and he said that my account messaged my friends the link and its no longer open anymore basically I got my account stolen because I trusted my friend and a fake link can you please look and see if they are using it or linking people or using a different IP than the original I do not know the email to the link and the website did look like the real website like 100% its not like I was tricked by some random website these guys knew what they were doing

replies.body: I edited out the link for security reasons.  It's possible your friend might have been compromised, and we want to help you guys!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we'll help update your info and work towards getting your account back.  Rest easy, we'll see you there!
